snippet.title: Cosmic Guerilla - (1979) - Arcade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Cosmic Guerilla
Universal © 1979 
[Coin-Op] Arcade Video Game
Emulator:  Mame 1.91

 Same team as cosmic alien?  Definitely same manufacturer (Universal), so here's another inferior game from the group that failed in copying Galaxian... now we bring you copy Space Invaders.  Alright, to be fair, this had much more originality and gameplay than their COSMIC ALIEN.  In this variation of Space Invaders, you have aliens on two sides of the screen shooting down at you while trying to break through, carry away your defenses, and eventually carry away your extra bases..er "guns".  So they either shoot you down, or carry the extra guns away.  
Except... if you are using your last "gun", why would there still be one to carry away?  

No matter.  I tried to see what would happen if they carried every last thing away (which I thought were little humans).  I thought there might be some big end-of-the-world end-of-game like if Space Invaders reach the bottom screen... but NOTHING happened.  Disappointed.  But, at least it was playable:  4,880 pts.
